Be Typography

Font per i testi: 'Jura', sans-serif;

Font per gli headings: 'Cinzel', serif;

Font per i blockquote: 'La Belle Aurore', cursive;

Font per gli pseudoelementi che precedono gli headings primari: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

Examples

Basic typography
Questo è il carattere con valore BIG con un link in mezzo utile a seguito di titoli o heading in generale

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. Questo è un link da solo invece waved about helplessly as he looked.

H2 Heading

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.

The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.

<h2>H2 Heading</h2>
<p> The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.</p>

The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.</p>
